flavorText.example: "Schwester von Nicol Bolas. Überlebende des Krieges der Drachenältesten. Die bösartigste ihrer Art."

language.description: Foreign language of card. Can be {{code:English}}, {{code:Spanish}}, {{code:French}}, {{code:German}}, {{code:Italian}}, {{code:Portuguese (Brazil)}}, {{code:Japanese}}, {{code:Korean}}, {{code:Russian}}, {{code:Chinese Simplified}}, or {{code:Chinese Traditional}}. Promo cards can be in {{code:Hebrew}}, {{code:Latin}}, {{code:Ancient Greek}}, {{code:Arabic}}, {{code:Sanskrit}}, or {{code:Phyrexian}}.

name.description: Name of the card in foreign language.

text.example:
"Fliegend, Wachsamkeit, verursacht Trampelschaden
Palladia-Mors, die Verwüsterin, hat Fluchsicherheit, falls sie noch keinen Schaden zugefügt hat."
text.description: Rules text of the card in foreign language.
